author: Xerbutri
description: The Saint Josephchurch at Tivoli, Eindhoven
realname: The Saint Josephchurch at Tivoli, Eindhoven
title: St Josephchurch
intro: In March/April I discovered this church was abandoned. In may I paid a visit, but could not find an entrance. In October I did and made some pictures from the inside.
history:
In 1940 the church was build. In 2005 it closed, since most of the inhabitants of the area have another believe these days.
The church remained in use for several non-religious purposes until early 2008. It was to be demolished in 2008. However a few months after the permit was given, local youth set fire to the church. They attempted this several times before, however this time it was a big one. Makes the demolishing easier and the story more sad. In 2011 the church is demolished.
